text: Anata gata wa, shitekina sodan o hajimeru mae ni hodokoshi o suru koto o shirigomi suru no ka. Karini sore o okonawazu, arra ga anata gata ni kaigo o yurusa reta baai wa, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi, arra to shito ni shitagai nasai. Arra wa anata gata no okonau issai o jukuchi nasa reru
